Posts.HTML:
Here's the Lobby Simulator...
Our second game and probably the emptiest simulator to play
Have you ever dreamed of waiting for nothing ?
We know you dreamed and don't worry we designed this simulator just for you...

In our first version (beta) ;
*You can wait in 3 different locations
*You can turn your head right
*You can turn your head left
*And also you can look straight
*And here goes the final ; Wait with your cat

It's a simulator dedicated to other simulator games and fans
Try to find all easter eggs and conversations
Our first big update is coming
Thanks for turning... (your head in the game)

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... -simulator

Posts.EditableText:
And we updated the game...
We added a secret room, new conversations and a new level
You can share your different combinations for each level to find secrets or other stuff...
Hope you enjoy !
Remember we're developing this game it's not the final version...
